alert.note: Alert for Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 05 at 10:27PM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A gusty shower will impact portions of northeastern Palm Beach County through 1100 PM EST... At 1026 PM EST, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a gusty shower capable of producing a funnel cloud near Downtown West Palm Beach, or over Palm Beach, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Locations impacted include... West Palm Beach, Jupiter, Palm Beach Gardens, Lake Worth, Riviera Beach, Palm Beach, Tequesta, Juno Beach, Palm Springs, North Palm Beach, Lake Park, Haverhill, Cloud Lake, Palm Beach International Airport, Port Of Palm Beach, North County Airport, Gun Club Estates, Schall Circle, Royal Palm Estates, and Lake Belvedere Estates. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County
